attributes.action: increase the carbon footprint in the south of England, thereby ensuring a high frequency of storms in the south-west and so improving the weather in the north of England (it's beautiful up here today!).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent warnings of severe storms in the south-west of England have proved to be well-founded. However, it's a beautifully calm and sunny day here in the north.

We don't think the perils of climate change are all they're cracked up to be. Here the change is making a positive contribution to industry, education, health, community spirit and morale.

We request that the Prime Minister does all he can to increase the carbon footprint in the south in order to ensure a continuation of this fine weather and its benefits.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
